instructions.de: Leicht rechts weiter auf Cool highway
instructions.en: Make a slight right to stay on Cool highway
instructions.eo: Turniĝu ete dekstren al Cool highway
instructions.es: Doble levemente a la derecha en Cool highway
instructions.es-ES: Doble levemente a la derecha en Cool highway
instructions.fr: S’aligner légèrement à droite pour rester sur Cool highway
instructions.id: Tetap agak di kanan ke Cool highway
instructions.it: Fai una leggera curva a destra per stare su Cool highway
instructions.pl: Skręć w prawo w łagodny zakręt, aby pozostać na Cool highway
instructions.pt-BR: Faça uma curva suave a direita para manter-se na Cool highway
instructions.ro: Virați ușor dreapta pe Cool highway
instructions.ru: Плавно поверните направо на Cool highway
instructions.sv: Sväng höger och fortsätt på Cool highway
instructions.tr: Cool highway üzerinde kalmak için sağa hafif dönüş yap
instructions.uk: Рухайтесь плавно праворуч на Cool highway
instructions.vi: Nghiêng về bên phải để chạy tiếp trên Cool highway
